## AbstractDynamicControl.viewComponent property

The control component that should be rendered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
viewComponent?: TControlComponent;
```

## Remarks

For arrays and groups; a value of undefined indicates the use of default component. For groups; a value of null indicates no component
